text: The silhouette of the majestic Pearl Tower tells us we ar SHANGHAI, just as day breaks. TWO BLACKED-OUT SUVs glide through a city that’s at once both ancient and modern. The CONVOY passes: The lights of Nanjing Road, shutting off with the dawn... Students practicing sunrise Tai Chi along the Huangpu riv The CONVOY continues past: Antique vendors on Dongtai Road, setting up for the day’s business... Eager chefs negotiating with seasoned fishermen for the p catch at a local fish market...
The TWO SUVs cut through a morning fog that gives this br the appearance of stretching to infinity...

The JOURNEY ENDS at one of the world’s busiest ports, whe both SUVs come to a STOP, and the RED-CARPET BOARDING STA of an AUGUSTA-WESTLAND AW101 HELICOPTER - the most expens rotorcraft ever made - beckons all to board.
The helicopter lifts off, leaving the port and its off-sh wind turbines behind. And heading out to sea...
Tourists, angling to get the best photographs of a pod of whales, HARDLY NOTICE THE HELICOPTER as it speeds by...

And neither do the sun-worshipping beachgoers, nor the hi spirited water lovers who surf the breaks. Only a LONE BOY looks up, shielding his eyes from the sun admire the HELICOPTER as it speeds by over the lush, trop isle and heads out INTO THE VAST PACIFIC... A WOMAN’S VOICE Imagine going to the moon...

The Helicopter flies low across the surface of the water. Endless blue as far as the eye can see.... A WOMAN’S VOICE But instead of it being a lifeless void, it was teeming with creatures so exotic, they boggle the mind.

The voice belongs to PRESCA MORRIS, an immaculately dress incredibly charismatic businesswoman. She’s speaking to h passengers for the day: EIGHT INTERNATIONAL VIPs -(whose personal fortunes come from American oil money, Mexican telecom, Brazilian Manufacturing, and Indian petrochemica MORRIS (CONT’D) Imagine exploring an alien world, whose scale dwarfs the highest of mountains, the grandest of canyons. Now imagine, instead of this being a fantasy, instead of it being a journey that would take years to complete, you could do it right here, right now. Ladies and Gentlemen, I welcome you, our first outside guests, to Mana-One.

The VIPs see MANA-ONE, a PLATFORM IN THE MIDDLE OF THE OC It’s industrial-looking, sits low in the water, and is li more than a wide, square landing area with docks/sub- launching arms protruding from each of its four sides.
(disappointed, to his Wife) That's it?
Morris leads the VIPs across the deck, heading for the on visible structure, a BANK OF ELEVATORS, that sticks up on otherwise flat platform, like some kind of design mistake
(to Morris) Obviously, when you get closer to completion, you’re gonna do this up, right?
(smiling) No. No? Did they hear that right? The ELEVATOR door opens, an if the VIPs thought that the platform was disappointing..

...Then the ELEVATOR takes that to another level. It’s a massive freight lift - the kind you’d find in a garment warehouse. The only clue that there is something more goi on here is that Morris is holding out STICKS OF--

Chewing gum, anyone? For your ears. I recommend it. The first time down can be a bit much. And so this group of people, collectively worth 1/4 of a TRILLION DOLLARS, take sticks of 99-cent chewing gum.
Are we on candid camera or something? Morris selects the “0” floor, using an old-fashion hand-c selector. DOWN they go. Fast.

Your ears are popping because, even though the station is normalized, pressure changes underwater are much greater than they are in the air. A Scuba diver, rising from the depth we're going to, would have to spend hours in a decompression tank or die a painful death. Then again, no scuba diver has ever been as deep as you're about to be. They reach the O-level. The elevator stops with a LURCH.
Your gum? Morris holds out a CHEAP PLASTIC CONTAINER for those who to get rid of their gum. That’s the last straw for TEXAS.

I’ve got to be honest with you, Ms. Morris. So far I find this whole thing profoundly underwhelming--  4. --as if on cue the ELEVATOR DOORS OPEN to reveal A HUMPBA WHALE gliding gracefully by right in front of them. ITS S fills the elevator as A SECOND HUMPBACK, a BABY, slides b
Then it’s a good thing it’s not the elevator you’re here to see. DR. MINWAY ZHANG - 60s, but brimming with the enthusiasm child, has been waiting for them here on the--

An all-glass world - shaped like a massive horizontal bic wheel. Its six “spokes” are corridors, and its “rim” is m than 1/4 mile around in its entirety. The result is a vie of sea life in every direction. A 360 degree aquarium cal the Pacific Ocean.

You are looking at something few people have ever seen. Life 1,000 feet beneath the surface... Standing next to Zhang, his granddaughter MEIYING, 8, see to take delight in watching the VIPs’ jaws drop.
On behalf of my granddaughter, Meiying, I welcome you to the Observation Level. A structure designed with the knowledge that nothing man makes will ever compete with the majesty of the sea.
We WALK with the group as Zhang leads them around a porti of the O-Level. Pausing to point out certain species of s life as they make appearances outside the glass.

Mana-one’s location, on the edge of a tectonic shelf, means we get an incredible variety of aquatic life. From something as common as the Bluefin Tuna... (two 800-lbs glide by) ...to something as rare and spectacular as... .--He nods for Meiying to identify what she sees outside:
(excited) An oarfish! Gasps are heard as the VIPs see AN OARFISH: a 35-ft long silvery ribbon of life with a dragon’s head.
This is incredible, Dr. Zhang.
Truly spectacular.
How long ‘til you open up to paying customers? Zhang looks to Morris. Those details are her department.
Ten months. In addition to this level, we're building a restaurant we think has the world’s greatest view, a hospital-quality infirmary, and most importantly, a gift shop. That gets laughs.

For years, I’ve traveled the world, urging people to take better care of the sea. My hope is now, by bringing the world here, the sea will speak for itself. There is some spontaneous applause for the achievement.
(Prompting Zhang) So, it’s no accident we invited you all here today...

...Yes. As you may remember, Mana- One is built where it is to give us access to the deepest reaches of our planet. The Marianas Trench. Nearly seven miles below the surface at its base, the mysteries of the trench hold the keys to a better understanding of the world in which we live. And yet it remains a place mankind has seen less of than the planet Mars. Our (MORE )

mission is to change that. Right now, as I speak to you, a team of our submersibles, including one piloted by my daughter, is putting the last of our UNIS BOT sensor stations in place, 30,000 feet below us. When powered up, these BOTS will send back images, the likes of which no one has seen before. And we want you, our angel investors, to be with us when we turn them on for the first time. Now everyone is really jazzed. TEXAS VIP looks at Morris.
Well played, little lady. Well played.

Zhang, Morris, Meiying and the VIPs emerge from the eleva and find themselves in a Mission-Control like space, know the DIVE CONTROL CENTER (DCC). A small TEAM OF PERSONNEL (who we'll get to know) is monitoring every aspect of the current mission into the trench. A dazzling array of vide screens shows us everything from the CREW MEMBERS’ VITAL SIGNS, to IMAGES FROM INSIDE THE SUBS, and of course, IMA OF WHAT’S OUTSIDE THE SUBS. A TACTICAL DISPLAY shows a computer representation of the dive going on right now. Two sleek ABYSS GLIDERS (Fastbac and Fastback 2) are orbiting at 20,000 feet down, acting sonar eyes in the sky for the two MULE SUBS (Angel 1 and Angel 2) that are actually in the trench placing the last the UNIS BOTS into position. The DIVE OPERATIONS CHIEF, James “MAC” Mackriedes, 30s, r around the edges, nods ‘hello’ to the VIPs and then resum what he’s doing. JAMES “MAC” MACKRIEDES (into a mic) Angel one, have you got that last bot in position? ANGEL ONE, the first of the Mules, is captained by JUNJIE Chen and co-piloted by CARL Sheppherd. We see their cockp on a screen. There’s a delay between the video and audio:
Standby... Bot is down. Footpad indicator. four greens. Inertial Power Unit: on. Tether: released.
The TACTICAL DISPLAY shows ANGEL ONE is no longer tethere its UNIS BOT cargo. And that the BOT is well-positioned i the trench. This gets the room excited.

Well everyone, it looks like we owe Dimitri an apology. His stuff might actually work. He’s referring to DIMITRI Karmanov, the handsome, blue-ey Russian Engineer who is watching the dive from a seat nex Mac. Mac pats Dimitri on the back. Dimitri is emotionless

Fan, let’s go ahead and ping the BOTS so we can start them up. This to Linfan “FAN” Chang, 24, a marine biologist whose are covered in decorative tattoos of mermaids and sea creatures. Fan is Meiying’s favorite team member, (beside her mom and grandpa), so it’s no surprise that Meiying ha joined her at the control panel. Fan enters a series of commands on her keyboard.
Wake-up boys... Give us a smile...
One by one, the two dozen BOTS, which have been placed in tandem along a length of the trench, BEGIN TO BLINK.
All Bots responding. Initial readings - nominal. Ready for power-up on your command. Fan looks at Mac, but then Mac, and everyone, looks at ZH This moment is the culmination of years of hard work.
Go ahead, please. Dimitri and Fan rapidly execute a series of keystrokes - reach the final button-push. Fan turns to MEIYING. Let’s push this last button together. As they do, Fan says...

Let there be light.  A SERIES OF QUICK CUTS BETWEEN POVS. 1) From Junjie’s and Francois’s MULES (Angel One and Two) hovering in the trench. They stare into the darkness - bu see NOTHING yet. 2) From an ABYSS GLIDER (Fastback One) orbiting above, piloted by SUYIN Zhang -- late 20s, beautiful and brillia Suyin looks down out the bottom of her glass cockpit. She sees the faint blinking position lights of the two Mules below... But NOTHING else.

text: THE TACTICAL DISPLAY shows all BOTS turning from Red to Green, meaning they should be on... But...
No visuals from BOT cameras. No data either. Is it possible something isn’t working? Mac looks at Dimitri. Dimitri stares, it will be fine.

(nervous, into the mic) Angel One, do you have a visual? (static) Junjie, I say again, do you have a visual? (static) Suyin, can you see anything from up where you are? Silence. It’s horrible. Mac is about to speak again when-
--Mana-One, confirmed. The BOTS are working... JUNJIE’S POV In the inky black reaches just below him, he now sees a series of BRIGHT WHITE LIGHTS - orbs in the darkness.

Not sure our cameras will do them justice. From here it looks like someone dropped the two most beautiful diamond necklaces you ever saw.  SUYIN’S POV From up here, it almost looks like an airport runway at night. Suyin breaks into a big smile.
Congratulations, father. You did it.
Applause breaks out. Zhang, beaming...
We did it. All of us.

And we have visuals. Welcome, everyone, to the most exotic place on planet Earth... The VISUALS begin to explode onto the DCC SCREENS. This i the Marianas Trench as we have never seen it. CORAL TOWER reach skyward like church spires. ACTIVE VOLCANOES spew plumes of deadly sulfur. And STRANGE, ALIEN CREATURES hau the waters. Bleach white cephalopods, invertebrates. Then --A SCREAM FROM ONE OF THE VIPs WHEN an ANGLER FISH appea on screen, like something out of a nightmare! That gives everyone a good scare. Then more LAUGHS.

Have no fear. That Angler Fish is only 6 inches long. And it’s six miles beneath us. There’s a MOMENT where everyone just marvels at what they see. Is that a tear in ZHANG’S eye? MAC and HELLER embrac FAN reaches out and surreptitiously SQUEEZES DIMITRI’S HA a secret romance between the fiery gal and icy Russian. PING... Amidst the celebratory laughs, a lone SONAR PING. And then another... PING...
Fastbacks One and Two. You guys see that?  10.

Suyin looks around. Her glass cockpit has a HEADS-UP DISP projected on it. And sure enough it is picking up SOMETHI moving fast, north to south, high to low, in the TRENCH. sub’s computer puts a little box around the ‘target’ even though it can’t actually be seen.
Copy that, Mana-One. I have one... Make that two targets... More BOXES appear... Indicating more targets... But then some disappear and re-appear... It’s really weird.
DJ, you picking this up?
“DJ" LAU, late 20s, a guy who exudes ‘cool’ in every way. flips a quarter through the fingers of his left hand, whi piloting his ship with his right.
My sonar’s lighting up like a Vegas casino. It’s got to be electrical interference.
Suyin can think of one OTHER possibility.
Angels one and two - suggest ascend 500 meters - there might be a rock slide heading your way.
Rock slide? The smile from Mac’s face vanishes.
Our sonar’s picking up nothing. And there’s no indication of seismic activity.

(looks at Mac) You worry too much. It’s interference, nothing more-- Suddenly -- SMASH -- THERE IS A BLACK SQUARE where one of BOT CAMERAS’ FEED used to be as the SIGNAL GOES OUT. Then  11. SECOND BOT CAMERA goes black. We see that Angler Fish suddenly dart away and then THAT CAMERA TOO GOES BLACK.

Piloted by FRANCOIS Bernard and his brother, LUC. They ar in a hovering orbit, with Junjie’s Mule “Angel One” visib not too far off their starboard side. They watch as - one by one - THE BOTS vanish into blackne
Mana, Angel Two. We've lost visual on the Bots. All of them.

text: Zhang confers with Mac. Fan and Dimitri pour over some da Nothing dramatic has happened up here, but the discussion among the staff is enough to make some people wonder:
(to Morris) Is everything okay? Mac catches wind of that question. Adjusts his tie and screws on the charm.

Everything is fine. The test went perfectly. I’ve asked Dimitri to power down the Bots so we could re- position them. Our placement was good, but you know Dr. Zhang, it has to be perfect, so... Morris, reading Mac, has already called for the Elevator. She jumps in--

(to the VIPs) --So we just want to say thank you, again, for making the trip to be a part of history. Before we take you back to Shanghai, we do still have one very important thing we have to do -- raid that gift shop so no one goes home empty handed. The VIPs step in the ELEVATOR, the door CLOSES, they’re G
Thank God the dog and pony show is over because I haven’t cursed in (MORE )

twenty minutes and I’m starting to worry about what might come out of my mouth. Talk to me, people. Mac approaches Dimitri, who is hovering over Fan, both watching the computer systems reboot. As Mac arrives he “loosens” his tie. Except Mac’s wearing a clip-on tie - so it comes right off. Fan’s attention turns from the comput screen to Mac’s absurd accessory.
It’s like you just pulled a unicorn off your shirt. I'd heard of clip- on ties, but thought they were an urban legend--
You think my tie is the reason we're staring at a wall of blank monitors!?
Honestly, I’m not prepared to rule it out.
(has the real answer) The BOTS have been knocked off their moorings. Suyin was right. It must have been a landslide.
Are you saying we have to put all the BOTS back in position? Dimitri nods. That’s a lot of work. Mac turns to Zhang.
Maybe we should bring everyone up, start fresh in the morning.

Sure, the BOTS are only 100 million euros a-piece. Let’s leave them unfastened at the bottom of the trench - what could go wrong? Mac doesn’t appreciate the sarcasm. But Zhang agrees with Dimitri. As does Fan. As does Mac, when he thinks about it.
Good news, gang. You’re going to earn some overtime...  13. ZHANG crosses to HELLER at the MEDICAL MONITORING STATION They can see the divers’ heart rates, body temperature, e
Dr. Heller, will it be safe for them to stay down there that long?
They're fine. Vitals are normal. (tries to lighten things) Junjie’s so relaxed, he might actually be asleep. Zhang smiles. He needed that. He looks over at Meiying.
Come on, sweetie, I’1l take you back to your room. Mommy's going to be down there a while longer.
Junjie puts his Mule into a descent.
Angel one. Heading back down. Try not to crash into me, Francois. I saw that bottle of Merlot you smuggled on board.
Francois puts his Mule into a descent.
Angel One, I take offense to that. No Frenchman would risk a dive for a Merlot. Now a good Bordeaux on the other hand...
We watch as the TWO MULES plunge into darkness. All is qu and peaceful UNTIL -- SOME FAST MOVING MASSIVE SHAPE -- glides across the FRAME and we...
Visual and Data feeds from all four subs are BREAKING UP Pictures go FUZZY... Voices sound computer DISTORTED...  14.
Angels One and Two, status?
Francois and Luc’s POV as they close in on a Bot. Their search and flood lights illuminating a cone of darkness.
Coming up on a Bot. Looks like it was knocked over.
Angel 2, was it a landslide?
Suyin fights to steady her Abyss Glider against the curre
DJ, current’s picking up. I’m firing starboard anchor. She flips a switch and...

An ANCHOR shoots out of the right wing-top of Suyin’s Aby Glider and lodges in the side of the vertical cliff face. Then WHOOSH -- another anchor goes by and burrows into th solid face -- revealing DJ'S Glider has done the same thi BELOW -- we can see the lights of Angel One and Two. Then SOMETHING PASSES OVER THEM - momentarily obscuring our vi
JUNJIE approaches a Bot. You can BARELY SEE ANYTHING arou him. The intense depth causes the HULL TO MOAN AND POP.
Through 11,000 meters. It’s pea soup down here guys. Something really stirred the sediment up.

Guys, this BOT is completely caved in. A bead of sweat rolls down Junjie’s forehead, as his sub anxiously creeps forward inches at a time. Finally, throu the haze of sand, the BOT COMES INTO VIEW.  15.
That’s impossible... JUNJIE'S POV OF THE BOT -- It’s completely torn apart.
Heller notices Junjie and Carl’s Heart rates begin to RIS
-..-looks like a bomb... We’re... through the wreckage.... Clues. Mac turns to Zhang. He’s got a bad feeling about this.
Dr. Zhang, I suggest we get our people out of there, go back down with an unmanned sub...

Junjie carefully guides his sub over the debris field. WE/THEY can only see inches at a time. Carl points to something that isn’t metallic grey in the wreckage. It’s a WHITE TRIANGULAR OBJECT, which is partially broken that is now embedded in the side of the UNIS BOT.
There’s something in the bot.
Mac continues his plea.
When I hear talk of an explosion--
There is nothing explosive down there.
--I don’t think Junjie is making it up, do you? Something happened.
The MYSTERIOUS OBJECT becomes more clear... There isn’t j ONE TRIANGLE. There are four, five, six...
Oh my God...  16. Junjie and Carl are transfixed by a row of GIANT TEETH.
Heller sees the HEART RATES of Junjie and Carl jump.
Junjie, I’m seeing major spikes for you and Carl - are you okay? They get no immediate answer - so Mac makes a decision.
This is Mana-One - code BUSTER. All vehicles commence ascent now.
Suyin realizes the Mules can’t hear Mac. She relays:
Angels one and two, code Buster. We're getting out of here.
Carl and Junjie - transfixed by the sight of the teeth.
Yeah. I think that’s a swell idea-- --In_less than a tenth of a second, SOMETHING hits Angel with the force of a FREIGHT TRAIN. The sub IMPLODES, kill Junjie and Carl instantly!
And sending flat lines to Heller's readings.
I’ve lost them!
(looking on tactical) So have I... Mac's radio calls to Angel One play over:
Francois and Luc are rising from the trench when suddenly sees a SHADOW approaching and WHAM--  17.
--Contact with Francois and Luc is lost. The DCC is in ch
Suyin can hear Mac’s frantic radio calls for Angels One a Two. She’s getting very worried now.
Angel One this is Fastback, over. Junjie, talk to me. Angel Two... Then... PING - PING. Suyin’s sonar begins to identify MULTIPLE TARGETS COMING UP AT HER FROM BELOW.
Suyin, I’ve got multiple targets, directly below and rising fast.
Angel One, Angel Two, come in...
Suyin, do you hear me? We’ve got to get out of here. Now!
PING - PING - PING - as the targets get closer, the pitch the PINGS increases and the volume gets louder. DJ cuts a his sub’s anchor - but sees Suyin hasn’t done the same.
Cut away or you'll be killed!
You want to run, run, but I’m not leaving them...
(to himself) Yes, you are...
In an INCREDIBLE DISPLAY OF PILOTING SKILL, DJ uses the w of his Abyss Glider to BREAK SUYIN’S ANCHOR LINE.
Suyin - furious -  18.

DJ, you son of a-- --BAM! BAM! BAM! Suyin doesn’t get to finish that thought because she’s hit by RISING DEBRIS FROM JUNJIE’S SUB. Instantly, her craft is damaged. Leaks spring. She begins to lose air pressure. ALARMS sound everywhere.
DJ hasn’t fared much better. He can see systems failing. flips dozens of switches from memory as he radios a repor

Mana-One, this is Fastback One in the blind. Both subs have been damaged, pressure vessel failing, commencing emergency ascent. He opens a glass panel and FLIPS a switch which turns the ABYSS GLIDER into a craft as buoyant as an air balloon.

Through the cracking cockpit glass over her head, Suyin s DJ's Abyss Glider begin to ascend. She reaches for the sa panel he used.... And flips it. SHE/WE HEAR - a muffled explosion. A compressed gas cannister has inflated her emergency ascent buoys. Her su rises like a missile.
Heller barks orders as he runs for the emergency lift.
Have the decompression chamber pressurized for 7,000 meters and get all hands to the starboard quarter for retrieval.
DJ and Suyin struggle to stay conscious and help guide th subs to the surface. The pressure and rapid ascent threat to rip their vehicles apart. And the pain is excruciating
Heller leads a staff of med-techs prepping the decomp tan  19.
DIVERS drop into the sea below. They will meet the subs a lock the hydraulic arms into position.
We stay close on Suyin as she fades out of consciousness. Her cabin is a cacophony of system alarms and warning lig

The pressure shift attacks Suyin’s hold on reality. Her P becomes increasingly surreal as she closes in on the Mana One. The ship lights reflect on her sub window, blinding heavenly. We are losing her. Her only connection to the world those deafening warning bells. She’s surfaced but doesn’t know it. Masked faces come into frame, an alien intrusion into her fever dream.
IN BLACK - we HEAR tap tap tap... tap tap tap...
Suyin AWAKES with a start. She looks around. DJ is with her. And tap tap tap - Meiying is signalling to her on th glass window of the decompression chamber hatch.
Hi, sweetie! They can’t hear each other, so they communicate by touchi hands on the glass.
(without turning to DJ, asks) Junjie and Carl?
No. But Francois and Luc are okay.
Dimitri and Fan are pouring over schematics of the MULE S as Mac talks with Francois...
And you tried isolating Bus-B?
Luc looks at Francois. Nods, he tried it.  20.
Our engines are fried, Mac. Air pressure’s good. Hull integrity is good. But I’m afraid you're going to have to come get us.
Any guess as to what hit you?
Do they have freight trains down here? INT. ZHANG’S PRIVATE OFFICE - MANA ONE Zhang, Heller, and Mac discuss their options. Off their All three
How much air do they have?
24 hours. That’s more than enough.
Dimitri needs five hours to repair the Abyss Gliders. Suyin and DJ can’t leave decomp for six - so I’m setting the dive for 1700 hours. nods...
Which gives us time to get a pilot for Angel 3. The best rescue diver on the planet is in Lufeng...
--You can’t be serious...
...-We need him. of them know who Mac means.
Mac, I appreciate your loyalty, but do I have to remind you what happened the last time he went this deep?
I don’t know what happened. And neither do you.  21.
He had a psychotic episode under pressure--
--That was your explanation, doctor. Not his.
Well - the Navy agreed with me.

Because it gave them a scapegoat. It let them close the books on bad mission and move on. (to Zhang) Dr. Zhang, a rescue like this, even with the best equipment in the world, is risky. If it’s me down there, if it’s my daughter going down there, there’s only one man on the planet I want for the job.

Wind whips across the arid ochre mesas of the Lufeng Quar We hear the sound of PICK-AXES. Then the delicate sound O BRUSH STROKES as A PhD CANDIDATE IN MARINE BIOLOGY carefu tries to separate what is fossil from what is Earth.
You don’t have to be so delicate... The Candidate’s Professor - JONAS TAYLOR, 30s, USN-Retire takes his student’s tools and demonstrates a quicker meth Quizzing the girl as he goes...
Have you identified the fossil? The Candidate stares at him. He’s her professor, he’s als rugged and gorgeous and tends to leave people tongue-tied
Carcharocles...
...Carcharocles Megaladon.
Good, and have you measured it?
Eight centimeters...  22.
Which means...
It was from a juvenile, 10-12 meters in length.
Very good. But the fact that it is black, fully carbonized, also means... He swings his hand axe at it... Clank... Nothing happens.
You couldn't break it if you tried. He gives her a friendly wink, she laughs, and he walks of WE WIDEN -- to see this is a permanent Archeological Dig funded by the DEEP SEA CENTER AT TIANJIN.
Jonas stares off into the magnificent vista, as A TEACHIN ASSISTANT hands him some papers to look through.
Looking forward to getting back to Tianjin, Professor?
I do love these two weeks in the quarry, but a new semester means fresh minds to open to all the amazing realities of our world.
You mean ‘possibilities’, right?

65 million years ago, this whole region was underwater. And those fossils out there were alive. Sure, the water has receded. But what makes you think the ocean itself has changed? The conversation trails off because of the sound of an arriving helicopter.
We expecting guests?  23. The TA shakes his head. He goes to check a clip-board. Jonas sees Mac, Heller, and Zhang get out.
There’s nothing on the schedule... The TA looks up - realizes he’s talking to an empty trail
Jonas gives Mac a big hug.
How are you, Captain?
Better than you, Mac, judging by the looks of you.
Captain Taylor, I’m--
I know who you are Dr. Zhang. It’s an honor and a privilege. Last, but not least, is a rather sheepish Heller.
Hello, Jonas.
Hey there, Tom. POW - Jonas punches Heller in the face. Heller goes down.
(deadpan) That actually went better than I expected.
Jonas looks through screen grabs taken from the video fee off of Junjie’s sub and the UNIS BOTs.
How long after the BOTs were activated did you lose them?
Maybe five minutes.  Mac shows 24.
And where were you, exactly? him on the chart. Jonas gives Mac a look.
You went back there?
It was my decision. That part of the trench has never been explored, its combination of depth and expanse make it--

The last great unknown on Earth. Yeah, I’ve heard that before. It’s why the Navy had the Chesapeake doing maneuvers down there. It’s why they had to send me in to rescue her men when she was mysteriously disabled. And it’s why this guy blamed me when everyone died!
I didn’t blame you. I simply said that your after-action report, claiming you had been attacked by something down there, was likely the result of hypoxic dementia--
After which I was court-martialed, black-balled from every diving operation in the world, and now receive a steady supply of hate mail from widows who think I’m the reason those men are gone.
Look, Jonas. I’m not a past or future guy. I’m present tense. I've got two crew members sitting down there--
And who are you going to send for their rescuers when they get taken out too?
Captain, I’ve read your account of what happened to you. Before today, (MORE )

I wouldn't have given credence to your theories. But now... Now, two of my friends are dead. And my daughter is only alive by providence. I’m here, we're here, because you give us the best chance of not adding any more friends to that list. Jonas looks out at the field of fossils. We don’t see wha he’s looking at, but we know he’s made up his mind.
Think of it as a chance to prove me wrong.
(looks at Heller a beat) Don’t you get it? I don’t want you to be wrong. Jonas walks out. They realize he’s heading for the helicopter. That’s good news.
All four of them are seated, the machine is about to lift off. Heller stares at a SCREEN CAPTURE PHOTO in Mac’s han

As DJ waits for death, FAN realizes the MEG has vanished. But where is it...? WHAM! The answer nearly sends Fan into the ocean herself. The MEG has moved off, and decided to strike one of the T ZODIACS tied up at the dock. It takes half the dock with The bad news is - with the dock damaged - that part of th station begins to take on water. The good news is - all t is happening a good distance away from where DJ is!
DJ! Go! Gol DJ, amazed to still be alive, SWIMS as fast as he can...

DJ manages only a few strokes BEFORE THE MEG’S DORSAL FIN STOPS in the water, like it just figured out it’s been du It violently spins around and heads straight for DJ, cutt through the ocean like a Miter saw.
WIDER - on DJ as he pushes forward. Over his shoulder, we begin to see the massive dorsal fin, rising into frame as gets closer. If DJ looks back, he’s dead.
A TRAILER SHOT - The tiny silhouette of the man... And th incredible scale of the monster that’s about to catch him
CLOSE ON DJ - Head down. Desperate. CLOSE ON THE MEG - mouth opening wide for feeding...  105.
In one fluid motion, DJ swings himself up onto the deck, rolls as far away from the water as he can get so when -- SLAM -- THE MEG RAMS THE SIDE OF THE LOADING AREA -- he remains safely out of reach.
Fan lets a scram of celebration. He made it. He made it!!
DJ, lying flat on his back, speaks to Fan via his ear- piece/mic.
You might want to take the stairs.

CLOSE ON - A PAIR OF HANDS - as they stack small SEMTEX PLASTIQUE (explosive) BRICKS into the shape of a Mayan pyramid. CLOSE ON - THE SAME HANDS - now securing the pyramid with strategic strips of duct tape. CLOSE ON - THE SAME HANDS - as they connect a small IMPAC PLATE TO THE TOP of the creation. PULL BACK TO REVEAL - Suyin watching Jonas finish his wor

(off her look) My ex-wife always said I was good at blowing things up. Jonas and Suyin load the bomb into a BACKPACK. Bomb safel inside, Jonas zips up the pack before Suyin carefully put on his back. She waits for him to start walking.

(I have a bomb on my back) You should go in front of me. Suyin nods, good point. As she starts for the Air-Lock, SOMETHING ON THE SUPPLY SHELF catches Jonas’s eye. Hand Flares. He thinks a moment. Then takes two.  106.
How’s it going up there, Mac?

MAC'S SWEAT DRENCHED EYES focus on the breaker panel with eager anticipation. He slams down the central switch and...BOOM!!! An explosion of sparks sends him reeling an almost off the edge of the power station. He’s blown the fuse board.
Oh, it’s going great. He opens up the BOARD and begins to remove a fuse with hi FINGERS...

While FAN’S FINGERS FLY across the keys of a LAPTOP. ON SCREEN we see: RSV-NAVIGATION CONTROLS - LINKING... LINKING... CONNECTED. BEGIN POWER UP SEQUENCE... Machine-sounds begin to fill the air behind Fan. Their source, THE UNMANNED SUBMERSIBLE, comes into view as DJ brings it out of Dimitri’s lab, pulling it along an overh conveyor belt.
Jonas, we're one minute to launch.
Jonas and Suyin, just visible in the gloaming, walk clear the storage facility and look up at the DARK MANA-ONE.
Camera range is limited. So you’ll have to guide me when I get close.

Mac is now at the main control board for the entire power station. FLIP - FLIP - FLIP... He powers up the Main Bus, and for a moment it looks like it will work until- BOOM! Again. Something goes wrong. This time forcing MAC to duck down for cover UNDER THE DESK.  107. While down there he sees an OPEN DRAWER. In it, is a smal box labeled, “in case of emergency”. He opens the box and finds a bottle of 1942 Don Julio tequila. He stares at it
RSV launched...
THE UNMANNED SUB descends RIGHT AT US... It passes by CAMERA... It’s TOW-LINE growing taut...
DJ watches as a BOT now follows the sub into the depths below. Next to him, FAN works the sub’s controls, which a linked to a LAPTOP that gives her a view from its NOSE CA
Bot clear and coming down to you.
Jonas and Suyin, standing there like decorations in an aquarium, exposed and doing their best to stay motionless
Any sign of our friend?
Zhang scans the water around the platform.
She’s not up here.
CLOSE ON THE MONITOR - showing the way ahead for the submersible. CLOSE ON FAN’S THUMBS - as she adjusts for currents. CLOSE ON THE DEPTH READ-OUT - now clicking past 150 meter
Like tumbleweeds blowing across a ghost town at high-noon STRANGE CLUMPS of PLANT LIFE roll by JONAS and SUYIN’S FE
That’s 150. You should see it any second now...  108. JONAS AND SUYIN - STRAINING THEIR EYES to look above them But it’s nearly impossible with the MANA-ONE still dark.

CLOSE ON - MAC - as finishes a re-patch and, with an exha POWERS IT UP. FLIP - FLIP - FLIP... Before he throws the final switch he takes a ceremonial ‘good luck’ sip of the tequila, puts the bottle down and then.... FLIP... No explosion... No boom.... Just a SERIES of GREEN LIGHTS COMING ON.
All the power comes back on in the abandoned DCC. We watc as the INTERNAL PRESSURE GAUGES return to NORMAL.
External lights go on. Zhang smiles at Meiying. Good news

Jonas and Suyin watch as the MANA-ONE blossoms to life. I like being at the foot of the Eifel tower at night. And thanks to the light they can now see the SUBMERSIBLE THE BOT - high above them - but making progress.
RSV in sight... But his voice TRAILS OFF because suddenly the SUB and the vanishes in A SHADOW.
PFFFFFT! - STATIC replaces the picture from submersible’s nose cam. The RSV stops responding to controls...
What the...?
Gradually, the shadow clears... And suddenly Jonas and Su are looking at THE BOT -- no longer tethered to anything dropping like a ROCK -- right down on top of them!

JONAS pushes SUYIN to cover behind rocky coral as -- SMAS THE BOT slams into the sea-floor, sending debris flying. For a minute, we can’t see anything through the all the S that’s been kicked up by impact.
Jonas, come in! Jonas, Suyin! Then the SAND clears. Jonas and Suyin are okay. But their plan literally lies in tatters all around their feet.
Fan, this is the moment you tell me Dimitri made two of those things.
Fan stares at her controls, still trying to re-establish contact with the machine. DJ puts his hand on her shoulde
That's a negative, Jonas.
Mac, who has joined Zhang and Meiying, looks at Zhang.
(in disbelief) There has to be another way.
Jonas has another way. He exhales.
Okay, then. DJ and Fan get to the Zodiac. As soon as Suyin surfaces, you load up and get as far away from here as you can.
What are you doing? Jonas shows her the hand flares.
Back-up plan. I use these to lure it to the O-level, we know how much it likes smashing that place up.
That’s a suicide mission.  110.
Not necessarily. It is, however, a solo mission so... Dr. Zhang, you're clear to bring Suyin up...
No...
DJ and Fan have joined Mac, Zhang, and Meiying.
Dr. Zhang, I repeat, bring Suyin up...
Jonas, let’s think a moment--
Dammit, it’s this or we all lose. Now bring your daughter back to her daughter, am I clear?
Suyin shakes her head.
No, we're in this together... She reaches out with a tether hook - hoping to connect Jonas’s suit to hers but just before she can... She is pulled away. She’s being pulled up.
Mac has thrown the lever himself.
I’m cutting loose!
She can still see Jonas - he looks at her.
Please don’t. The distance between them growing... The flickering light the Mana-One revealing the sadness in Suyin’s eyes... Then she disappears into the haze.  111.
Jonas approaches an emergency airlock at the base. He touches the keypad. It lights up.
Mac. I forgot to say - great job with the power. Not that I ever doubted you.
Mac smiles at the joke. Behind him, the group cautiously boards the lone Zodiac tied to what’s left of the dock.
Okay, maybe I did...
So, a back-up plan, huh?
Jonas, free from his suit, climbs a seemingly endless lad backpack still on.
Jonas emerges from a hatch on the backside of the Elevato shaft. He walks around so he can see ALL THREE REMAINING SPOKES - AND THE RIM THAT IS ATTACHED TO THEM ALL.

You just be ready to get out of here when I tell you. He presses the elevator button. Waits and then - ding. It arrives. He steps inside, presses the button for the surface, then WEDGES the door so it doesn’t go anywhere.

text: He’s heading towards the rim, appreciating the magnificen structure this used to be.
Dr. Zhang, I don’t know what kind of security deposit you put down on this place, but I don’t think you're getting it back.
Whatever it takes, Jonas....  112.
FAN unties the bow, ZHANG the stern. Everyone is on board including -- SUYIN, who surprises Jonas when she chimes i
Just make sure you get back up here.
Jonas, pleased Suyin has said this. Happy to hear her voi
Okay... Thirty seconds.
The ZODIAC’s engine roars to life.
The noise of the ZODIAC is more of a low vibration down here... One the MEG turns towards... It begins its ascent but then... TWINKLING RED-LIGHTS catch its attention. It’s Jonas... In the O-Level...
Twenty seconds...
Jonas has struck the two flares and he’s waving them in h hands... Waiting... Hoping to see the MEG coming for him.
Come on... Come on... The MEG turns -- and comes straight towards him. JONAS ho his ground... And holds it... And holds it... Then--
Ten seconds. Go! Jonas tosses the flares so that they will land close to t backpack. As they arc high in the air, he turns and sprin FOR THE ELEVATOR...  113.
The ZODIAC puts some distance between itself and the stat
Five seconds... Four...
Jonas runs into the Elevator and pulls out the wedge. The doors close, and the ELEVATOR QUICKLY BEGINS TO RISE.
(smiling) ...Three... two... THAT’S WHEN ALL THE POWER GOES OUT - INCLUDING THE POWER THE ELEVATOR - BRINGING EVERYTHING TO A GRINDING HALT. So _ much for his escape.
The passengers see the station power down. Grim reality s in. They know that can’t be good for his plan.
For a moment Jonas just sits there in the darkness. Then sees something. Gum. He stakes a stick as he finishes the countdown--
--One.
SMASH. The glass of the center spoke gives way to the pow of the MEG. And the MEG plows right into the backpack.
An explosive force of more than a 1000 sticks of dynamite released.

The MEG dies in three stages that play out in less than 1/100th of a second. First, the BLAST WAVE liquefies the cartilage that makes up its body, essentially turning int giant shark-suited goo. Then, the HEAT super cooks the sk into a black charcoal. Finally, the glass shards pierce t carcass, VAPORIZING it into a cloud of tissue and blood t leaves no mistake - THE MEG IS NO MORE.  114.
The explosion, moving faster than sound, hits the elevato BEFORE the sound does. So for a dizzying moment, the elevator is rocketed skyward, a bullet in a silent barrel
A JET OF FIRE - shoots through the seams of the rapidly rising rocket lift. Suddenly Jonas thinks it’s walls are made of flame. Then FLAMES obscure our view of him.
From the Zodiac, the Mana-One looks like a volcano. JETS FIRE erupt randomly from the station, followed by a DEAFE BLAST that causes the team to duck and cover.

Still shooting towards the surface, flames swirling. Then when the pressure has reached its crescendo, THE ELEVATOR ITSELF DISINTEGRATES, and, like a cocoon that’s revealed cargo, it releases Jonas into the OCEAN. Floating in and out of consciousness, rising towards the light, the last thing JONAS sees is a hazy image of THE B HUMPBACK WHALE. It’s safe. Then he passes out and we...
The Zodiac navigates the seas around what’s left of the M One. They’ve been searching for ten minutes with no sign. Expressions are grave. It’s Suyin who sees him.

There! JONAS is lying, half in the water, half clinging to a floating remnant of the Mana-One. But he’s not moving. Th crew agonizes, waiting for a sign... They get it when Jon without raising his head, lifts a weary arm skyward and g them a THUMBS UP.

A reverent crowd sits, listening to the end of a MEMORIAL SERVICE/CELEBRATION OF LIFE. SUYIN stands at a dais, in  115. front of the MEMORIAL ITSELF, a beautiful, white marble, standing wall that is shaped like a WAVE. On the wall, etched tastefully, as if they were part of the wave, are names and histories of Junjie, Carl, Luc, Francois, Helle and Dimitri. SUYIN, stunningly beautiful in her formal dress, turns to final page of her dedication speech.
(at the dais) Advancing our understanding of life has always required great sacrifice. The world doesn’t give up her secrets easily...
JONAS, dashing in a suit. MAC, a little less so in his. F and DJ both looking cooler than everyone else in the plac ZHANG watches Suyin with great admiration.
(quietly to Jonas) She’s her father’s daughter all right.

(at the dais) My father’s dream, a dream shared by those we honor today, is that we come to appreciate the gift that is our oceans. Now, thanks to their efforts, the entire world knows that there is more to this gift than we dared imagine. And I see, in everyone’s eyes, the same excitement I once saw exclusively in my father’s. That is how I know the friends we lost will live forever. (it hangs there) Thank you all very much. Off the applause we CUT TO...
People milling about, congratulating Suyin who is with Zh Meiying, Jonas, and Mac. A passing waiter offers some cra cakes... Jonas shakes his head...
He’s allergic.  116. Mac takes a beat.
You are? Is that ironic? (as they laugh) And since when does Meiying know stuff about you that I don’t... Mac's voice trails off as he realizes Jonas and Suyin are TOGETHER.
Oh, uh, never mind--
Try to keep up, Mac. That gets laughs. Mac is in the middle of a comeback when US and a CHINESE NAVAL OFFICER interrupt the festivities.
Excuse me, Dr. Zhang, we have a situation and we’d like to talk to you.
This is a service for my friends, now is not--
--A deep-sea drilling platform tore open a dormant volcano this morning. It’s created a hole in the thermocline.
How big a hole?
(long beat) It’s the size of Manhattan.
We watch as an animated conversation ensues, and then all them hurry out through the crowd, pausing to grab FAN and and then disappearing from our view behind the wave wall.
